entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
